title: Measurement or Fact
description: A measurement of or fact about the ObjectGroup representing the objects in the collection description, or the relationship between the ObjectGroup and an associated class.

measurementType.description: The nature of the measurement, fact, characteristic, or assertion being made about the collection.

measurementValue.description: The numeric value of the quantitative measurement being made about the collection.

measurementAccuracy.description: The description of the potential error associated with the measurementValue applied to the collection.

measurementUnit.description: The units associated with the measurementValue applied to the collection.

measurementMethod.description: A brief description of or reference to (publication, URI) the method or protocol used to determine the measurement, fact, characteristic, or assertion being applied to the collection.

measurementRemarks.description: Comments or notes accompanying the MeasurementOrFact being applied to the collection.

measurementDerivation.description: An indicator as to whether the measurement, fact, characteristic, or assertion being applied to the collection was derived from reported figures or aggregated/calculated from underlying data.

measurementFactText.description: The value of the qualitative fact, characteristic, or assertion being made about the collection.

identifier.description: One or more Identifiers relating to the Measurement or Fact

reference.description: One or more References relating to the Measurement or Fact
